content.question:
The work shown was created during the fifth century B.C.E. and is believed to represent Poseidon or Zeus.

Describe at least two visual characteristics of the work shown.

Explain how at least two characteristics of the work create a sense of balance.

Explain how the work shown is typical of Greek sculpture created during the fifth century B.C.E.

topic.text: 2.1: Cultural Contexts of Ancient Mediterranean Art

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Explain how a specific work of art (or group of related works of art) demonstrates continuity and/or change within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
